NFSv4/pnfs: Fix a use-after-free bug in open

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.19.4 by commit b03d1117e9be7c7da60e466eaf9beed85c5916c8, it was introduced in version v5.19 by commit 6949493884fe88500de4af182588e071cf1544ee. For more details please see the references link.
